dark.description: All content that is dark and should be downloaded in the background.

items.description: All content that is dark and should be downloaded in the background.

bundle.description: The URL for the bundle definition

priority.description: The priority of the asset. 0 being least priority and MAX_INT being highest.

live.description:
All content that is live and must be active at all times. The order
                               of bundles is significant. Those list last, will overshadow those
                               listed before it.

items.description:
All content that is live and must be active at all times. The order
                               of bundles is significant. Those list last, will overshadow those
                               listed before it.

priority.description: The priority of the asset. 0 being least priority and MAX_INT being highest.
